Package com.poesys.db.dto

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IDbDto
    Base interface for the database Data Transfer Objects (DTOs).
    IDtoCache<T extends IDbDto>
    An interface for a cache of data transfer objects (DTOs); you can cache a DTO, get a DTO from the cache using its primary key, remove a DTO from the cache using its primary key, or clear the entire cache.
    IObserver
    The DTO observer provides the observer part of an Observer design pattern interface for DTO objects.
    ISet
    A Strategy-pattern interface for strategies that set data members of a Data Transfer Object.
    ISubject
    The DTO subject provides the subject part of the Observer design pattern interface for DTO objects.
    IValidate
    A Strategy-pattern interface for strategies that validate data members of a Data Transfer Object.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractBatchDeleteSetter<T extends IDbDto>
    An abstract implementation of the ISet interface for a Strategy-pattern class that deletes a collection of DTOs as part of a more comprehensive transaction, taking in a connection and not closing it.
    AbstractBatchInsertSetter<T extends IDbDto,C extends java.util.Collection<T>>
    An abstract implementation of the ISet interface for a Strategy-pattern class that inserts a collection of DTOs as part of a more comprehensive transaction, taking in a connection and not closing it.
    AbstractBatchUpdateSetter<T extends IDbDto>
    An abstract implementation of the ISet interface for a Strategy-pattern class that updates a collection of DTOs as part of a more comprehensive transaction, taking in a connection and not closing it.
    AbstractCollectionDeleteSetter<T extends IDbDto>
    An abstract implementation of the ISet interface for a Strategy-pattern class that deletes a collection of DTOs as part of a more comprehensive transaction, taking in a connection and not closing it.
    AbstractCollectionInsertSetter<T extends IDbDto>
    An abstract implementation of the ISet interface for a Strategy-pattern class that inserts a collection of DTOs as part of a more comprehensive transaction, taking in a connection and not closing it.
    AbstractCollectionReadSetter<T extends IDbDto>
    An abstract implementation of the ISet interface for a Strategy-pattern class that sets a collection element of a data transfer object as part of a de-serialization read-object process.
    AbstractCollectionUpdateSetter<T extends IDbDto>
    An abstract implementation of the ISet interface for a Strategy-pattern class that updates a collection of DTOs as part of a more comprehensive transaction, taking in a connection and not closing it.
    AbstractDeleteSetter<T extends IDbDto>
    An abstract implementation of the ISet interface for a Strategy-pattern class that deletes a single DTO as part of a more comprehensive transaction, taking in a connection and not closing it.
    AbstractDto
    An abstract implementation of the IDbDto interface for data transfer objects.
    AbstractInsertSetter
    An abstract implementation of the ISet interface for a Strategy-pattern class that inserts a single DTO as part of a more comprehensive transaction, taking in a connection and not closing it.
    AbstractLazyListSetter<T extends IDbDto,P extends IDbDto,C extends java.util.Collection<T>>
    An abstract implementation of the ISet interface for a Strategy-pattern class that sets a list element of a data transfer object as a lazy-loading operation, taking in a connection and closing it.
    AbstractLazyLoadingDtoProxy
    The AbstractLazyLoadingDtoProxy is a Proxy-pattern class that abstracts the shared services required to proxy a data transfer object (DTO) to add lazy-loading services to its members.
    AbstractLazyObjectSetter<T extends IDbDto>
    An abstract implementation of the ISet interface for a Strategy-pattern class that sets an object within a data transfer object as a lazy-loading operation, taking in a connection and closing it.
    AbstractListReadSetter<T extends IDbDto>
    An abstract implementation of the ISet interface for a Strategy-pattern class that sets a list element of a data transfer object as part of a de-serialization read-object process.
    AbstractListSetter<T extends IDbDto,S extends IDbDto,C extends java.util.Collection<T>>
    An abstract implementation of the ISet interface for a Strategy-pattern class that sets a list element of a data transfer object as part of a more comprehensive transaction, taking in a connection and not closing it.
    AbstractObjectSetter<T extends IDbDto>
    An abstract implementation of the ISet interface for a Strategy-pattern class that sets an object element of a data transfer object as part of a more comprehensive transaction, taking in a connection and not closing it.
    AbstractProcessNestedObject<T extends IDbDto>
    An abstract implementation of the ISet interface that contains the logic for processing a single DTO, determining which operation it requires.
    AbstractProcessNestedObjects<T extends IDbDto,C extends java.util.Collection<T>>
    An abstract implementation of the ISet interface that contains the logic for looping over a set of DTOs, determining which operation to take for each.
    AbstractSetter<T extends IDbDto>
    An abstract class that centralizes things for all setters.
    AbstractUpdateSetter<T extends IDbDto>
    An abstract implementation of the ISet interface for a Strategy-pattern class that updates a single DTO as part of a more comprehensive transaction, taking in a connection and not closing it.
    ConnectionCacheSetter
    A setter that caches a connection identified by a primary key in the Memcached connection cache.
    ConnectionCacheUnsetter
    A setter that un-caches a connection identified by a primary key in the Memcached connection cache.
    Deserializer<T extends IDbDto>
    A helper class that provides shared code for deserializing cached objects
    DtoCache<T extends IDbDto>
    The DtoCache provides a concurrent map cache for the objects of the concrete class.
    DtoCacheWithMessaging<T extends IDbDto>
    Adds messaging to the methods in the superclass DtoCache.
    DtoMemcached<T extends IDbDto>
    The DtoMemcached class implements a caching scheme using the open source memcached distributed caching system.
    HasPrimaryKey<T extends IDbDto>
    Implements a generic validator for checking that a Data Transfer Object (DTO) has a primary key.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    IDbDto.Status
    Enumerated type with the four possible states of the object
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DtoStatusException
    An exception that indicates that a Data Transfer Object (DTO) violates a constraint.
